name: MX Adventure
description:
Ride a KLX 250r on challenging terrain. Collect as many coins as you can without crashing. Make sure you take it easy with the gas, this bike has a little bit of power, to keep yourself from becoming airborne or pulling a wheelie and flipping right over.

Bike upgrades coming soon!

Full Unity3D source code available for you to use in your own game.

Built with Unity4.x
